content: {"version":1,"content":"{\"settings\":\"{\\n    // Editor\\n    \\\"editor.fontFamily\\\": \\\"Fira Code, Consolas, monospace\\\",\\n    \\\"editor.fontLigatures\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.minimap.enabled\\\": false,\\n    \\\"color-highlight.markerType\\\": \\\"dot-before\\\",\\n    \\\"color-highlight.languages\\\": [\\\"*\\\"],\\n    \\\"color-highlight.matchWords\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.colorDecorators\\\": false,\\n    \\\"editor.formatOnPaste\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.formatOnSave\\\": true,\\n    \\\"editor.defaultFormatter\\\": \\\"esbenp.prettier-vscode\\\",\\n    // Workbench\\n    \\\"workbench.iconTheme\\\": \\\"material-icon-theme\\\",\\n    \\\"workbench.editor.titleScrollbarSizing\\\": \\\"large\\\",\\n    // Terminal\\n    \\\"terminal.integrated.fontFamily\\\": \\\"Fira Code, Consolas, monospace\\\",\\n    \\\"terminal.integrated.cursorBlinking\\\": true,\\n    \\\"git.autofetch\\\": true,\\n    \\\"git.enableSmartCommit\\\": true,\\n    \\\"git.postCommitCommand\\\": \\\"sync\\\",\\n    \\\"git.confirmSync\\\": false,\\n    \\\"githubIssues.useBranchForIssues\\\": \\\"off\\\",\\n    \\\"githubIssues.issueCompletionFormatScm\\\": \\\"fix: #${issueNumber} - ${issueTitle}\\\",\\n    \\\"conventionalCommits.gitmoji\\\": false,\\n    // Gitlens\\n    \\\"gitlens.views.repositories.location\\\": \\\"gitlens\\\",\\n    \\\"gitlens.views.fileHistory.location\\\": \\\"gitlens\\\",\\n    \\\"gitlens.views.lineHistory.location\\\": \\\"gitlens\\\",\\n    \\\"gitlens.views.compare.location\\\": \\\"gitlens\\\",\\n    \\\"gitlens.views.search.location\\\": \\\"gitlens\\\",\\n    // ToDo\\n    \\\"todohighlight.keywords\\\": [\\n        {\\n          \\\"text\\\": \\\"TODO:\\\",\\n          \\\"color\\\": \\\"red\\\",\\n          \\\"border\\\": \\\"1px solid rgba(188,80,80,0.6)\\\",\\n          \\\"borderRadius\\\": \\\"2px\\\",\\n          \\\"backgroundColor\\\": \\\"rgba(188,80,80,0.3)\\\"\\n        }\\n    ],\\n    \\\"todo-tree.tree.showScanModeButton\\\": false,\\n    // gitignore it\\n    \\\"ignoreit.array\\\": [\\n        \\\".DS_Store\\\",\\n        \\\"/node_modules/\\\",\\n        \\\".idea/\\\",\\n        \\\"*.ld\\\",\\n        \\\"/Quellen/\\\",\\n        \\\"_notes/\\\",\\n    ],\\n    //\\n    \\\"python.insidersChannel\\\": \\\"weekly\\\",\\n    \\\"gitlens.views.repositories.files.layout\\\": \\\"list\\\",\\n    \\\"color-highlight.markRuler\\\": false\\n}\"}"}
